remarks: The defining property of an open set of a metric space.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Sep-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)
statement:
mopnval.1 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
elmopn $p |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( A e. J <-> ( A C_ X /\ A. x e. A E. y e. ran ( ball ` D ) ( x e. y /\ y C_ A ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d X x y $.
